questionContent: 工作好一段時間了，有了一些存款，做點理財嗎？
The boss asked you to work overtime and work on weekend. What would you do?
At this time, the boss told you to enter him for entertainment, how would you choose?
What do you want to do with your family？
The company suddenly shut down. What should you do in future？
Your child suddenly told that he wants to start a business. Would you like to borrow 5 million, would you lend him?
Your child failed in business, would you insisted he to pay back the money?
There're a lot of free time after retirement. Do you want to cultivate an interest?
How about having some appointment with old friends?
An old friend ask if you want to invest 2.5 million in new  restaurant business, yes?
The restaurant is well decorated; what would you do in the face of business operations?
Do you have any plan for your future after recovering from a serious sickness？
Wife is gone, but it’s not a way to be sad whole life... Trying to go out of the pain, what can you do?
